mapper.select: select b.id,a.mac mac,b.rssi rssi,date_format(a.time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as time,b.s_id from (select a.mac,max(time) as time from (select id,rssi,mac,time,s_id from info where s_id=#{id}) a group by a.mac)a left join info b on a.mac=b.mac and a.time=b.time
select a.id,a.mac,a.rssi,date_format(a.time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as time from (select id,rssi,mac,time,s_id from info where info.time > NOW()-INTERVAL #{hour} HOUR) a where a.s_id=#{id}
select a.id,a.mac,a.rssi,date_format(a.time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')as time from (select id,rssi,mac,time,s_id from info where info.time > NOW()-INTERVAL 60 MINUTE) a where a.s_id=#{id}
